snippet: Get confused is the first and last message of “Alibis: Sigmar Polke 1963-2010” at the Museum of Modern Art.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews exhibit of works by Sigmar Polke at the Museum of Modern Art.
lead_paragraph: Get confused is the first and last message of “Alibis: Sigmar Polke 1963-2010” at the Museum of Modern Art.
